Title: Loading Modded files in Persona 5 (PS3)
Author: ShrineFox
Description: This guide walks you through the fundamentals of datamining and replacing files for any region/version of Persona 5 on PS3.

Title: Persona 5 RPCS3 Modding Guide 1: Downloads and Setup
Author: Cryptoss
Tags: CRIPAKGUI, MOD COMPENDIUM, MOD LOADER, MOD.CPK, PATCH.YML, PERSONA 5, RPCS3
Description: This straightforward tutorial lists everything you need in order to run Persona 5 mods on RPCS3.
Guide Text: Persona 5 Modding Guide: Downloads and Setup

Title: Persona 5 RPCS3 Modding Guide 2: Creating and Installing Mods
Author: Cryptoss
Tags: CRIPAKGUI, DATA.CPK, MOD COMPENDIUM, MOD.CPK, PERSONA 5, RPCS3
Description: Find out how to create your own Persona 5 mods using the Mod Compendium.

Title: Persona 5 EBOOT Patching
Author: ShrineFox
Description: This tutorial goes into detail on how to add patches from patch.yml to an EBOOT.BIN on a CFW PS3.

Title: Creating Custom SFX/Music in P5
Author: ShrineFox
Description: Learn how to create your own custom background music or sound effects in Persona 5.

Title: Adding Randomized Battle Tracks to Persona 5 (PS3)
Author: ShrineFox
Description: This is an advanced tutorial on adding extra DLC music tracks to the game and shuffling them randomly between battles using an EBOOT modification.
Guide Text: Adding Randomized Battle Tracks to Persona 5 (PS3)

Title: Loading GMD Models and Animations in 3DSMax
Author: ShrineFox
Description: This guide explains how to load GMD models and GAP animations properly in 3dsmax (including models from the Dancing games)
Guide Text: Loading GMD Models and Animations in 3DSMax

Title: Loading Modded Files in Persona 3/4 (PS2)
Author: ShrineFox
Description: This guide describes the process of unpacking and repacking your ISO and CVM files using the Mod Compendium.

Title: Modding Using HostFS on PCSX2 (P3/P4/SMT3)
Author: ShrineFox
Description: This guide explains how to mod P3, P4, and SMT3 without ever needing to repack your ISO.

Title: Modding Persona 5 Royal (JP/USA) on PS4 FW 5.05, 6.72 & 7.02
Author: ShrineFox
Description: A full walkthrough for exploiting PS4 firmware 6.72 to install "fake packages" and generate modded P5R Updates using the Mod Compendium.

Title: Make a Model Compatible with Persona 5
Author: Crowpocalypse
Description: This is a tutorial for newcomers to the Persona 5 modding scene, but it can also serve as a checklist or reminder for current modders. The area I'm covering is specifically for making sure the new model you bring into the game will work, it does not cover the process of rigging a model. What we want is to make sure the model is functional before starting heavy work like retexturing and rigging.

Title: Beginner's Guide to Modding Persona 4 Golden
Author: MadMax1960
Description: Getting into Persona 4 Golden modding can be daunting at first, but this guide is here for you. We've got a step-by-step guide for setting up and installing P4G mods, as well as some resources in case you'd like to make your own!
